title: Should bronze/silver players be allowed to use the word serious when searching for a type of team?

replies.body: Yes because everyone should be equal in the game, even if their skill on the game is horrible it's still better to have a 'Serious' team with that player so that he / she can adapt to their play style or develop a play style in the game :)

> [{quoted}](name=MastersYiAndMe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EwwBtETb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-22T00:57:09.838+0000)
>
> Yes because everyone should be equal in the game, even if their skill on the game is horrible it's still better to have a 'Serious' team with that player so that he / she can adapt to their play style or develop a play style in the game :)

equality? no thx, want to here a joke? bronze  and silver rights {{champion:119}}
It's not like we have a choice everyone and anyone can say what they want despite it being true or not.
A catch off a snapper. Got bait mate. I rate.
Ok what exactly are you trying to get out of this...regardless the answer...
